title: HOMEMADE EGG NOODLES
directions: 1. Beat the eggs until light and fluffy.
2. Add the remaining ingredients. Knead until smooth.
3. Roll out on a floured surface to about 1/8" thickness.
4. Cut into strips- I just used a pizza cutter. You can store them in the fridge for 2-3 days or in the freezer for 1-2 months.
5. Cook 7-9 minutes in boiling water. (I used 1 cup chicken stock and 4 cups water.)
6. Serve any way you like- but they are fabulous in chicken soup!
